message.content:
Enkcazelo ka inkampani okanye i-arhente karhulumente kukufumana imibhalo ngezixhobo ezintsha, ukugcwalisa yonke imibhalo yokubhalisa, kwaye ukugcwalisa imibhalo yokukhawuleza emva kokubhalisa. Ndiya kukubonelela imiyalelo yokufumana imibhalo ngezixhobo ezintsha:

1. Funda ngokunye: Funda kwiwebhusayithi yencwadi yamakhasimende ukwazi iimfuno ezifunekayo ngokuthi uqalise ukubhalisa. Ngaphandle kwesicelo, ngaba unengxaki ekufumaneni izixhobo ezingaphambili, fumana kwiwebhusayithi yencwadi yamakhasimende ngemibuzo yakho.

2. Bhala ngokubhalisa: Xelela umbhalo wokubhalisa ngokucacileyo ngokuzikhethela umdibanisi, umfundi okanye umsunguli. Khumbula ukuba ngumzekelo kakhulu ukusebenzisa izimvo zokuphinda kwezixhobo, ukuvula imibhalo emibini ngaphambi kokuyenza ukuze ufumane izinto ezintsha.

3. Qhagamshelana nomdibanisi: Ukuba ukhangele nawe mdibanisi, qhagamshelana naye ukuba ufumane imibhalo emiphefumlo ngokugcwalisa amakhophi, ukungena nokwenza izicelo. Yenza oku kukukunikeza imibuzo ngokunye ukuba ufumane ukunceda ngendlela enokunciphisa.

4. Vala imibhalo: Xelela ukuba umdibanisi okanye i-arhente karhulumente ukhuphe imibhalo yakho. Zama ukubuyisa imibhalo kunye nomsebenzi wokunciphisa imibhalo uk
